nodes.text: A kinetite generator, also called a kinetite charge, was a type of concussion field generator.

A kinetite generator used concussion vector vanes and transmission planes to drive kinetic energy to a concussion field generator, where it was stored as a kinetite charge. This kinetic energy could then be released as a widely dispersed concussion blast.
The war club used by the Knight of Ren Ushar contained a kinetite generator that made use of a heavy and blunt end to build up a concussion charge, releasing it as a powerful shockwave.

Enfys Nest made use of an Electroripper staff that utilized a kinetite charge, using the shockwaves it generated to great effect in combat. Multiple times she used large blast waves to throw groups of people off their feet, such as when she used her Electroripper staff against Crimson Dawn's Hylobon Enforcers. Enfys used a much smaller blast wave against Tobias Beckett when she fought him aboard a 20-T Railcrawler conveyex transport, sufficient to throw him backward several meters. Enfys used this same small-scale blast not moments later in an acrobatic pole vault onto her waiting Swoop, allowing her to jump the distance between the conveyex and her getaway vehicle.
